channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Long Thoughts

item.title: About me
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: Curious about finding some truths. Looking to call things by their real & appropriate name. Passionate about exploring ideas in writing as part of this blog. I work in IT, so some topics will be centered around that. There I find great joy in designing and creating IT systems that work well. Possibly I will break the blog up to make it easier to follow just this category based on peoples interest.
